choices.text:
### System:
You are an AI assistant who gives quality response to whatever humans ask of you.

### Human:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company

### Assistant:

Dear [Boss's Name], 

As per our discussion, I wanted to formally inform you that I will be resigning from my position at [Company Name]. My last day of work will be on [Date]. 

I want to express my gratitude for the opportunities and experiences I have gained while working here. It has been a privilege to work with such talented individuals, including yourself. However, it is time for me to pursue new challenges and take the next step in my career path. 

I will do everything possible to ensure a smooth transition during my remaining time at [Company Name]. Please let me know if there are any specific tasks or projects you would like me to prioritize before my departure. 

Thank you again for your support and guidance throughout the years. I wish [Company Name] continued success in all its endeavors. 

Sincerely, 
[Your Name]
